item.title: Joseph add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake." -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Ayrton Senna
item.description: "These things bring you to reality as to how fragile you are; at the same moment you are doing something that nobody else is able to do. The same moment that you are seen as the best, the fastest and somebody that cannot be touched, you are enormously fragile." -- Ayrton Senna

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Ayrton Senna
item.description: "And suddenly I realized that I was no longer driving the car consciously. I was driving it by a kind of instinct, only I was in a different dimension." -- Ayrton Senna

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Ayrton Senna
item.description: "On a given day, a given circumstance, you think you have a limit. And you then go for this limit and you touch this limit, and you think, 'Okay, this is the limit'. And so you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high." -- Ayrton Senna
